channel.title: 508 - Help moving a NPC to another spot - 508
channel.description:
I really need help moving a NPC from the current spot its at to the new home I have made. Please post if you can help me! :)
I have tried to find it's current coords in the sources files but I could not find any coords where to have it be.

item.title: 508 - Help moving a NPC to another spot - 508
item.dc:creator: @Chiller Chiller
item.description:
@Chiller wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:5, topic:348917”][quote author=Chiller link=topic=445288.msg3269432#msg3269432 date=1279090130]

npcspawn.cfg

Well I search that and nothing comes up. The server source I am using is Berky-Scape.
[/quote]What are you searching for? You need to search for the NPC’s ID.[/quote]
I’ve searched for the ID but when I get to the part of the coding that has it there is no coords.

Read full topic
item.source: 508 - Help moving a NPC to another spot - 508
